tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RecyclingPrograms (
  program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE,
  total_recycled_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  success_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE recycling_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  program_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_statistics (
  statistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  recyclables_collected DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_program_id FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES recycling_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingPrograms (
	program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	program_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CollectionCenters (
	center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	center_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100),
	contact_person VARCHAR(100),
	contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingRecords (
	record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	program_id INT,
	center_id INT,
	recycled_material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	recycling_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES RecyclingPrograms(program_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES CollectionCenters(center_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingPrograms (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  recycling_center_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE ProgramMaterials (
  program_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY(program_id, material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES RecyclingPrograms(program_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES RecycledMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_bins (
    bin_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    bin_type VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    location_id INTEGER,
    capacity INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES recycling_centers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE collection_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    bin_id INTEGER,
    collection_date DATE,
    collected_amount INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES recycling_bins(bin_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_programs (
    program_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    coordinator VARCHAR,
    budget NUMERIC
);
